import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Set the account status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mail/accounts/state"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets the status of an account with the email address specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"email":{"description":"Account email address","type":"string"},"state":{"description":"Account activity status: true - enabled, false - disabled","type":"boolean"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Account mailbox ID","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
